landingPage.title: Fast-Track Your Loan Eligibility.
landingPage.description: Discover your loan options with our secure, streamlined process. Get clarity on your eligibility in just minutes.

personalDetails.title: Personal Details
personalDetails.description: Please provide your basic personal information.

loanDetails.title: Loan Details
loanDetails.description: Please provide information about your loan requirements.

loginPage.title: Login to your accounts
loginPage.description: Please enter your email and password to login.

registerPage.title: Register your account
registerPage.description: Please enter your email and password to register.

egigible.title: Congratulations, you are approved!
egigible.description: Based on the information provided, you are eligible for the loan. Please review the details below.

notEligible.title: Unfortunately, you are not eligible for the loan.
notEligible.description: Based on the information provided, you are not eligible for the loan. Please review the details below.

riskAssessment.title: Risk Assessment
riskAssessment.description: Your financial profile is strong, placing you in the lowest risk category.
